TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You can sing one song. And even that you can't do well. And the one song is http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Longplayer

I wish for a pocket universe in which I'm an omnipotent god and I could go to/from the world whenever I want, and I can control the timescale in my universe.

Granted, but there's nothing in it, and it's too small to build anything in.

I wish i had an infinite all-you-could-eat-buffet and the food was delicious and not poison.

Granted. You can't eat the food as for you just died.

I wish for a wish that I can wish so no one can wish no more wishes.

Granted, Canada is now on the moon.

I wish for more moon pies.
Granted. But they are under Canada

Granted, but you did not say your wish, so i will make one up for you.

(Clears throat)

"i wish that all vending machines in Canada would explode"

-thecanadianvendingmachine

And I wish that the world was made of cheese.

Edited November 17, 2013 by quasarrgames

Granted. But since I am ALREADY turned inside out, I am normal again. Cheers!

I wish for me to stop forgetting wishes

Granted. You not only remember all your wishes, you also remember everything that happened in your life. Your brain explodes from too much information.

I wish KSP forum posts worked like YouTube comments did before google+ destroyed them, to avoid all the confusion of replies.

Granted. But why would you want that? It would be full of 5 year olds!

I wish for people to read my wish

granted. the

is now

.

I wish the wish i wished but was not answered.

Granted. Read the answer stated above

I wish for People to realise white text.

Granted. But now everything ever is all white and nothing else.

I wish for a throne to sit on.

Granted. Since most secrets in writing are written in white text,all the secrets of all literature are revealed.

I WISH THIS GAME WASN'T SO CONFUSING.

Oh yeah and for answer #4581 i think we may see different outcomes. wierd

Granted. Now the game is to write out all of Grahams Number to the power of Grahams number

I wish to be better at c++

Granted. You create HAL9001 and it kills you.

I wish I wasn't sick as a dog.

Granted, but you can now only ever code purely in c++.

I wish I had bothered to learn basic c++.

Granted, but I ninja'd you (take a look back)

I wish for dragons

Granted. Guess who's on the top of the food chain now, beaches?

I wish for dragon powered rockets.

Granted, but the dragons take over the entire rocket, in every instance. What did you expect?

I wish I was a dragon.

Granted, but Dovahkiin kills you.,

I wish I wasn't so darn ill.

Granted. You are now dead

I wish to have bothered to learn Advanced C++

Granted, but you forget the basics of C++

I wish for a wish to wish so the wish could be wished on a wish.

Granted. As for you wished on a wish, which doesn't seem gramatically correct, it isn't granted

I wish for no one to see my gramatical mistake

Granted, but you obsess over it to the point of insanity and are locked up in a mental institution for the remainder of your miserable life.

I wish I had money.

Granted. You now have a whopping one yen!

I wish I had instructions.
